articles.title: EU sends jolt to Apple's Lightning port with new law mandating USB charging for all phones - CBC.ca
articles.description: The European Union is hoping to say goodbye to junk drawers full of different charging cords by forcing all smartphones sold in the continent to use one standard: USB.
articles.content:

articles.title: iPhones may need redesign as EU pushes for common charger - News24
articles.description: Apple may have to redesign its iPhones to use USB-C charging ports under draft rules from the European Union aimed at cutting waste and simplifying life for consumers owning multiple devices.

articles.title: EU to impose universal phone charger, in blow to Apple - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The European Commission believes a standard cable for all devices will cut back on electronic waste, but Apple says a one-size fits all charger will stop innovation and create more pollution.
articles.content:
The European Union on Thursday said it will impose a universal charger for smartphones, setting up a clash with Apple and its widely used iPhone connector cable.
